properties.Description: describes Custom Assessment Automation request properties.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

compressedQuery.Description: Base 64 encoded KQL query representing the assessment automation results required.

supportedCloud.Description: Relevant cloud for the custom assessment automation.

severity.Description: The severity to relate to the assessments generated by this assessment automation.

displayName.Description: The display name of the assessments generated by this assessment automation.

description.Description: The description to relate to the assessments generated by this assessment automation.

remediationDescription.Description: The remediation description to relate to the assessments generated by this assessment automation.

assessmentKey.Description: The assessment metadata key used when an assessment is generated for this assessment automation.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.Description: describes properties of custom entity store assignment request

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

principal.Description: The principal assigned with entity store. If not provided, will use caller principal. Format of principal is: [AAD type]=[PrincipalObjectId];[TenantId]

entityStoreDatabaseLink.Description: The link to entity store database.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

etag.Description: Entity tag is used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource.

tags.Description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource.

hierarchyIdentifier.Description: The multi cloud resource identifier (account id in case of AWS connector).

cloudName.Description: The multi cloud resource's cloud name.

offerings.Description: A collection of offerings for the security connector.

organizationalData.Description: The multi cloud account's organizational data

offeringType.Description: The type of the security offering.

cloudRoleArn.Description: The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature

kubernetesScubaReader.Description: The kubernetes to scuba connection configuration

cloudWatchToKinesis.Description: The cloudwatch to kinesis connection configuration

kinesisToS3.Description: The kinesis to s3 connection configuration

offeringType.Description: The type of the security offering.

cloudRoleArn.Description: The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature
The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature
The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature
The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature

defenderForServers.Description: The Defender for servers connection configuration

offeringType.Description: The type of the security offering.

cloudRoleArn.Description: The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature

servicePrincipalSecretMetadata.Description: Metadata of Service Principal secret for autoprovisioning

expiryDate.Description: expiration date of service principal secret

parameterStoreRegion.Description: region of parameter store where secret is kept

parameterNameInStore.Description: name of secret resource in parameter store

offeringType.Description: The type of the security offering.

cloudRoleArn.Description: The cloud role ARN in AWS for this feature

organizationMembershipType.Description: The multi cloud account's membership type in the organization

parentHierarchyId.Description: If the multi cloud account is not of membership type organization, this will be the ID of the account's parent

stacksetName.Description: If the multi cloud account is of membership type organization, this will be the name of the onboarding stackset

excludedAccountIds.Description: If the multi cloud account is of membership type organization, list of accounts excluded from offering
